Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky reddish below; exterior: billet pattern at rim above band of dotted rectangles with two vertical flanking strokes; below, trace of possible pendant triangles as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 260, no. 514)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0483) (phase 2)
